meta.name: The Midnight Atelier
meta.subtitle: Snatched silhouettes. Midnight silk. A wardrobe for the wardrobe.
meta.tagline: Step through the fur coats into something darker.
meta.hero_quote: I have been searching for the stars, and I have found them in your eyes.
meta.footer_message: For nights that turn into mornings.

products.name: Kourtney Silk Dress
products.description: The dress that makes you feel like the main character. Silk charmeuse that fits at the bodice and flows to a midi hem. Button front for drama. Black—because some nights are meant to be mysterious.
products.expected_content: black silk midi dress button front fitted bodice

products.name: Cocoon Silk Slip Dress
products.description: A slip dress that's actually wearable. Heavy silk that doesn't cling in the wrong places. Cowl neck, bias cut, ankle length. The kind of dress that whispers rather than shouts.
products.expected_content: black silk slip dress cowl neck bias cut
products.search_query: Jenni Kayne silk slip dress black

products.name: East Hampton Pant
products.description: The pant that makes you walk different. Wide leg, high rise, pleat front. It's the pants that editors wear to Fashion Week. It's the pants that say you've arrived.
products.expected_content: black wide leg pants high rise pleated women
products.search_query: Nili Lotan East Hampton pant black

products.name: Pleated Tailored Trousers
products.description: Scandinavian minimalism meets downtown cool. Pleated front, tapered ankle, and a silhouette that flatters everyone. The kind of trouser you build outfits around.

products.name: Hangisi 70 Pump
products.description: The shoe. Navy blue satin with the Swarovski crystal buckle. It's not just a shoe, it's a piece of jewelry for your feet. 70mm heel for dancing until the magic fades.
products.expected_content: navy blue satin pumps crystal buckle
products.search_query: Manolo Blahnik Hangisi navy satin pump

products.name: The Demi in Black Suede
products.description: Made-to-order flats that feel like clouds. Black suede, perfect for late night adventures. Spanish craftsmanship meets New York minimalism.

products.name: T-Lock Clutch
products.description: Minimalism with an edge. The T-Lock clutch in black grain leather. Sculptural shape, silver hardware. It holds your phone, your lipstick, and your secrets.
products.expected_content: black leather clutch bag silver hardware

products.name: Threadbare Band
products.description: A whisper of gold. Thin enough to stack, solid enough to last. Brooklyn-made, ethically sourced. The ring that goes with everything because it goes with you.
